data.actual_result: A popup appears saying that the link is spoopy, and leads to '!!!!'
data.short_description: If you click on the title of an embed that doesn't have a link, discord's Link Masking popup will appear anyways.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a a message, webhook or otherwise, with a title, author, or any other element that uses <a> without having a source - Click on the link
